attributes.action: Dissolve the national parliaments of Scotland and Wales and introduce a bill to create a nation state of Great Britain.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Devolution has caused a dangerous appetite for separation and disunity. The nonsense of a separate England, Scotland and Wales is compounded by our slavish membership of an increasingly disunited EU. Great Britain should be free! We are moving in the wrong direction.
